creator: Biddl Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Looking for cool products way below wholesale prices? Blidz, the first gamified shopping app has all you need and more. Join thousands of users in fun bargain hunts and invite your friends to get even better deals. Blidz together, save more together.

🤝 SHOP TOGETHER, SAVE MORE - BLIDZ DUO DEALS 🤝


At Blidz, we reward you for sharing your purchase with your friends. It’s super simple: when you see a product you want, tap the Duo Deal check out in the right corner. Share your unique link with a friend and if they install and open the app, you get a huge discount, up to 100% off the regular price. That’s it! And the best thing: after signing up, your friend gets our free welcome gift and the chance to share their own links and win huge discounts. It’s always better to shop together!

WHY IS BLIDZ SO CHEAP OR EVEN FREE?


We believe in people over marketing. By sharing Blidz YOU make sure the prices stay low. Invite your friends now to get better discounts!

BLITZ THE COMPETITION. WIN INCREDIBLE DEALS.


Deal Races are the newest and most exciting feature to come to Blidz. In Deal Races, you can compete with other users to win amazing products (smartphones, game consoles, tablets and the likes) for up to FREE. Your victory depends solely on your skills, so gear up, start your engines and prepare to race!

DOES BLIDZ REALLY HAVE QUALITY PRODUCTS?


You want it, we got it! Browse through more than 100 000 trending products, from top class electronics and gadgets to jewellery and fashion and hunt down the hottest deals and bargains below market prices. Gamified and powered by AI. That means the more you use Blidz, the better deals we can offer you.

WHAT MAKES BLIDZ DIFFERENT AND FUN?


Blidz is much more than just another boring shopping app. Not only can you find great products for every aspect of life, but you are also in control of the purchase price! Compete to win high-value items completely FREE in our Deal Races, share deals with your friend to cut get huge discounts, win tons of Points in our mini-games to spend in the app and enjoy a fun community!

Special sign-up offer: Every new user gets a gift worth up to $10 after signup!

CORE FEATURES



★ A welcome gift after sign-up worth up to $10
★ Starter loyalty point pack
★ More than 70,000 available products
★ 1000s of new deals every day
★ Unique roller-coaster flash deals with up to 95% off
★ Loyalty point rewards and fun surprises at every corner
★ Personalized deals and product selection powered by AI
★ 100% secure & fully encrypted payments methods PayPal & all major credit cards
★ Lightning fast support - contact us at support@blidz.com


PRODUCT CATEGORIES



📱 Electronics (smartphones, tablets, accessories, cases, chargers etc.)
🏠 Home products (decor, toys, utensils etc.)
👗 Fashion (men’s, women’s and children’s for every occasion)
💍 Jewellery (earrings, necklaces, rings etc.)
💄 Beauty products (makeup, skincare, hair styling, etc.)
🚴‍♂️ Garden and outdoor (hiking gears, picnic & BBQ, etc.)
🖨 Office supplies (stationery, office shelves etc.)
🐱 Pet products (pet toys, clothing, collars, shelters, etc.)

TELL US WHAT YOU THINK



Do you like the experience? Is there anything you’d like to see improved? Let us know! Opinions from valued customers like you are very important to us. We review all of your feedback and will always strive to do the best for our customers.

You can reach us by email support@blidz.com any time!

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA



• Facebook (https://facebook.com/blidzcom)
• Instagram (https://instagram.com/blidzcom)
• Twitter (https://twitter.com/blidzcom)
• Medium blog (https://medium.com/blidz)

Privacy Policy:
https://blidz.com/privacy.html

Terms of Service:
https://blidz.com/terms.html

descriptionHtml:
Looking for cool products way below wholesale prices? Blidz, the first gamified shopping app has all you need and more. Join thousands of users in fun bargain hunts and invite your friends to get even better deals. Blidz together, save more together.

🤝 SHOP TOGETHER, SAVE MORE - BLIDZ DUO DEALS 🤝


At Blidz, we reward you for sharing your purchase with your friends. It’s super simple: when you see a product you want, tap the Duo Deal check out in the right corner. Share your unique link with a friend and if they install and open the app, you get a huge discount, up to 100% off the regular price. That’s it! And the best thing: after signing up, your friend gets our free welcome gift and the chance to share their own links and win huge discounts. It’s always better to shop together!

WHY IS BLIDZ SO CHEAP OR EVEN FREE?


We believe in people over marketing. By sharing Blidz YOU make sure the prices stay low. Invite your friends now to get better discounts!

BLITZ THE COMPETITION. WIN INCREDIBLE DEALS.

In Deal Races, you can compete with other users to win amazing products (smartphones, game consoles, tablets and the likes) for up to FREE. Your victory depends solely on your skills, so gear up, start your engines and prepare to race!

DOES BLIDZ REALLY HAVE QUALITY PRODUCTS?


You want it, we got it! Browse through more than 100 000 trending products, from top class electronics and gadgets to jewellery and fashion and hunt down the hottest deals and bargains below market prices. Gamified and powered by AI. That means the more you use Blidz, the better deals we can offer you.

WHAT MAKES BLIDZ DIFFERENT AND FUN?

title: Blidz - Hunt Deals Cheaper than Wholesale ✨

creator: Biddl Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Looking for cool products way below wholesale prices? Blidz, the first gamified shopping app has all you need and more. Join thousands of users in fun bargain hunts and invite your friends to get even better deals. Blidz together, save more together.

🤝 SHOP TOGETHER, SAVE MORE - BLIDZ DUO DEALS 🤝


At Blidz, we reward you for sharing your purchase with your friends. It’s super simple: when you see a product you want, tap the Duo Deal check out in the right corner. Share your unique link with a friend and if they install and open the app, you get a huge discount, up to 100% off the regular price. That’s it! And the best thing: after signing up, your friend gets our free welcome gift and the chance to share their own links and win huge discounts. It’s always better to shop together!

WHY IS BLIDZ SO CHEAP OR EVEN FREE?


We believe in people over marketing. By sharing Blidz YOU make sure the prices stay low. Invite your friends now to get better discounts!

BLITZ THE COMPETITION. WIN INCREDIBLE DEALS.


Deal Races are the newest and most exciting feature to come to Blidz. In Deal Races, you can compete with other users to win amazing products (smartphones, game consoles, tablets and the likes) for up to FREE. Your victory depends solely on your skills, so gear up, start your engines and prepare to race!

DOES BLIDZ REALLY HAVE QUALITY PRODUCTS?


You want it, we got it! Browse through more than 100 000 trending products, from top class electronics and gadgets to jewellery and fashion and hunt down the hottest deals and bargains below market prices. Gamified and powered by AI. That means the more you use Blidz, the better deals we can offer you.

WHAT MAKES BLIDZ DIFFERENT AND FUN?


Blidz is much more than just another boring shopping app. Not only can you find great products for every aspect of life, but you are also in control of the purchase price! Compete to win high-value items completely FREE in our Deal Races, share deals with your friend to cut get huge discounts, win tons of Points in our mini-games to spend in the app and enjoy a fun community!

Special sign-up offer: Every new user gets a gift worth up to $10 after signup!

CORE FEATURES



★ A welcome gift after sign-up worth up to $10
★ Starter loyalty point pack
★ More than 70,000 available products
★ 1000s of new deals every day
★ Unique roller-coaster flash deals with up to 95% off
★ Loyalty point rewards and fun surprises at every corner
★ Personalized deals and product selection powered by AI
★ 100% secure & fully encrypted payments methods PayPal & all major credit cards
★ Lightning fast support - contact us at support@blidz.com


PRODUCT CATEGORIES



📱 Electronics (smartphones, tablets, accessories, cases, chargers etc.)
🏠 Home products (decor, toys, utensils etc.)
👗 Fashion (men’s, women’s and children’s for every occasion)
💍 Jewellery (earrings, necklaces, rings etc.)
💄 Beauty products (makeup, skincare, hair styling, etc.)
🚴‍♂️ Garden and outdoor (hiking gears, picnic & BBQ, etc.)
🖨 Office supplies (stationery, office shelves etc.)
🐱 Pet products (pet toys, clothing, collars, shelters, etc.)

TELL US WHAT YOU THINK



Do you like the experience? Is there anything you’d like to see improved? Let us know! Opinions from valued customers like you are very important to us. We review all of your feedback and will always strive to do the best for our customers.

You can reach us by email support@blidz.com any time!

• Instagram (https://instagram.com/blidzcom)
• Twitter (https://twitter.com/blidzcom)
• Medium blog (https://medium.com/blidz)

🤝 SHOP TOGETHER, SAVE MORE - BLIDZ DUO DEALS 🤝


At Blidz, we reward you for sharing your purchase with your friends. It’s super simple: when you see a product you want, tap the Duo Deal check out in the right corner. Share your unique link with a friend and if they install and open the app, you get a huge discount, up to 100% off the regular price. That’s it! And the best thing: after signing up, your friend gets our free welcome gift and the chance to share their own links and win huge discounts. It’s always better to shop together!

WHY IS BLIDZ SO CHEAP OR EVEN FREE?


We believe in people over marketing. By sharing Blidz YOU make sure the prices stay low. Invite your friends now to get better discounts!

BLITZ THE COMPETITION. WIN INCREDIBLE DEALS.


Deal Races are the newest and most exciting feature to come to Blidz. In Deal Races, you can compete with other users to win amazing products (smartphones, game consoles, tablets and the likes) for up to FREE. Your victory depends solely on your skills, so gear up, start your engines and prepare to race!

DOES BLIDZ REALLY HAVE QUALITY PRODUCTS?


You want it, we got it! Browse through more than 100 000 trending products, from top class electronics and gadgets to jewellery and fashion and hunt down the hottest deals and bargains below market prices. Gamified and powered by AI. That means the more you use Blidz, the better deals we can offer you.

WHAT MAKES BLIDZ DIFFERENT AND FUN?


Blidz is much more than just another boring shopping app. Not only can you find great products for every aspect of life, but you are also in control of the purchase price! Compete to win high-value items completely FREE in our Deal Races, share deals with your friend to cut get huge discounts, win tons of Points in our mini-games to spend in the app and enjoy a fun community!

Special sign-up offer: Every new user gets a gift worth up to $10 after signup!

CORE FEATURES



★ A welcome gift after sign-up worth up to $10
★ Starter loyalty point pack
★ More than 70,000 available products
★ 1000s of new deals every day
★ Unique roller-coaster flash deals with up to 95% off
★ Loyalty point rewards and fun surprises at every corner
★ Personalized deals and product selection powered by AI
★ 100% secure & fully encrypted payments methods PayPal & all major credit cards
★ Lightning fast support - contact us at support@blidz.com


PRODUCT CATEGORIES



📱 Electronics (smartphones, tablets, accessories, cases, chargers etc.)
🏠 Home products (decor, toys, utensils etc.)
👗 Fashion (men’s, women’s and children’s for every occasion)
💍 Jewellery (earrings, necklaces, rings etc.)
💄 Beauty products (makeup, skincare, hair styling, etc.)
🚴‍♂️ Garden and outdoor (hiking gears, picnic & BBQ, etc.)
🖨 Office supplies (stationery, office shelves etc.)
🐱 Pet products (pet toys, clothing, collars, shelters, etc.)

TELL US WHAT YOU THINK



Do you like the experience? Is there anything you’d like to see improved? Let us know! Opinions from valued customers like you are very important to us. We review all of your feedback and will always strive to do the best for our customers.

You can reach us by email support@blidz.com any time!

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA



• Facebook (https://facebook.com/blidzcom)
• Instagram (https://instagram.com/blidzcom)
• Twitter (https://twitter.com/blidzcom)
• Medium blog (https://medium.com/blidz)

Privacy Policy:
https://blidz.com/privacy.html

Terms of Service:
https://blidz.com/terms.html

title: Blidz - Hunt Deals Cheaper than Wholesale ✨

creator: Biddl Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Looking for cool products with the best price among all marketplaces? Blidz, the first gamified shopping app has all you need and more. Join thousands of users in fun bargain hunt and invite your friends to get deals never found in anywhere else!

🤝 TOGETHER, YOU SAVE - BLIDZ DUO DEALS 🤝

At Blidz, we reward you for sharing your purchase with your friends, through our unique Duo Deals. It’s super simple: when you see a product you want, instead of buying by yourself (costing much higher prices), choose to buy together with a friend. You will then get the best price in the market up to 95% off, guaranteed!

WHY IS BLIDZ SO CHEAP OR EVEN FREE?

We believe in people over marketing. By sharing Blidz, YOU make sure the prices stay low. Invite your friends now to get better discounts!

What’s more, simply by being active in the app and inviting friends, you can earn Blidz Cash to buy our products even cheaper. What are you still waiting for?

BLITZ THE COMPETITION. WIN INCREDIBLE DEALS.

Treasure Hunt is the newest and most exciting feature to come to Blidz. In Treasure Hunts, you can compete with other users to win amazing products (smartphones, game consoles, tablets and the likes) for up to FREE. Your victory depends solely on your skills, so gear up, gather your companions and prepare to hunt!

DOES BLIDZ REALLY HAVE QUALITY PRODUCTS?

You want it, we got it! Browse through more than 100,000 trending products, from top class electronics and gadgets to jewellery and fashion and hunt down the hottest deals and bargains below market prices. Gamified and powered by AI. That means the more you use Blidz, the better deals we can offer you.

WHAT MAKES BLIDZ DIFFERENT AND FUN?

Blidz is much more than just another boring shopping app. Not only can you find great products for every aspect of life, but you are also in control of the purchase price! • Consumer Electronics (smartphones, tablets, accessories, cases, chargers etc.)

Do you like the experience? Is there anything you’d like to see improved? Let us know! Opinions from valued customers like you are very important to us. We review all of your feedback and will always strive to do the best for our customers.

You can reach us by email support@blidz.com any time!

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Say hello to the new Blidz!
We're so happy to present a complete overhaul of Blidz - brand-new design, powered-up tech and amazing lower prices on all products. Everything is fine-tuned in little detail just for one purpose: to serve you the best mobile shopping experience ever.
Let's have a blast with 2021. Together, you save!

title: Blidz - Together, you save! 🤝 ✨

creator: Biddl Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Looking for cool products with the best prices among all online shops? Join thousands of users at Blidz, the new social shopping app, with millions of trending products from Apple to Xiaomi.

How can we offer brand products at the lowest prices anywhere? It's all because of you! Instead of spending money on marketing we invest in you by slashing prices. No middlemen + no mark-ups + no marketing expense = best prices anywhere.

🤝 TOGETHER, YOU SAVE - BLIDZ DUO DEALS 🤝
At Blidz, we reward you for sharing your purchases with your friends. DuoDeals allow you to get the most value-for-money with discounts of 90% or more. It’s super simple: when you see a product you want, choose to buy it with a friend. Ta-da! You and your friend just saved $$$ on a quality product together (for example iPhones or TVs).

🎮 USER REWARDS AND GAMES 🎮
Need a break from shopping? Join our games to win free products. With Blidz you don’t just waste your time while gaming, you get real-money rewards. We’ve got you covered: at sign-up you receive your first gift to get you started. Use your points to enter games like treasure hunt, mystery box and Deal FREEze for your chance to win products and cash.

🚀 BLITZ THE COMPETITION & WIN INCREDIBLE DEALS 🚀
Blidz is much more than just another boring shopping app. It’s as if you’re going to the mall together with your friends, just online. Inside awaits a fun playground with the best deals and fun games to make the shopping experience more exciting. Compete in the Treasure Hunt game to win high-value items like smartphones and TVs completely free, participate in fun auctions in our Deal FREEze game and win tons of fat loot to spend inside!

🆓 WHY IS BLIDZ SO AFFORDABLE OR EVEN FREE? 🆓
We believe in our users instead of spending money on marketing. By sharing Blidz, YOU make sure the prices stay low. Invite your friends now to buy more deals at better discounts!

But there is more: by being active in the app, you can earn free Blidz Cash to buy our products even cheaper. Especially, active users get points and cash drops that can be exchanged for real-world products. What are you still waiting for?

🌟 DOES BLIDZ REALLY HAVE QUALITY PRODUCTS? 🌟
You want it, we got it! Browse through millions of trending products from high-end electronics and gadgets to jewellery and fashion. All products are sourced without middle-men from top-tier brands like Apple and Xiaomi. To support you in your shopping experience, we have a 100% secure payment system, customer-friendly return policy and lightning-fast support to help you cash in on the best deals.

Special sign-up offer: Every new user gets a gift worth up to $25

CORE FEATURES
• Free starter pack
• Millions of available products
• Best price guarantee amongst all online shops
• Social Duo Deals allow you to cash-in on buying with your friends
• Point rewards and fun games
• Personalized product selection
• 100% secure & fully encrypted payments methods: PayPal & all major credit cards
• Fast-delivery and express shipping options
• 30-day guaranteed return policy
• Lightning fast support - contact us at support@blidz.com

PRODUCT CATEGORIES
• Consumer Electronics (smartphones, tablets, cases, chargers etc.)
• Home products (decor, kitchenware, home appliances etc.)
• Fashion (men’s, women’s and children’s for every occasion)
• Jewelry (earrings, necklaces, rings etc.)
• Accessories (Hats, gloves, stockings etc.)
• Outdoor & Sports (Camping, fishing, etc.)
• Mother & Kids products (Toys, functional equipment, etc.)
• Beauty products (makeup, skincare, hair styling, etc.)
• Garden and outdoor (Tools, picnic & BBQ, etc.)
• Office supplies (stationery, office shelves etc.)
• DIY (electric parts, industrial tools, automotive parts etc.)
• Pet products (pet toys, clothing, shelters, etc.)

Privacy Policy:
https://home.blidz.com/privacy.html

Terms of Service:
https://home.blidz.com/terms.html
descriptionShort: Get 1M+ quality electronics & fashion bargains, 70-100% off with your friends.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Say hello to PERMANENTLY REDUCED PRICES! Sorry for shouting, but we're so excited to present to you a completely new version of Duo Deal pricing. Now, when you choose to buy a Duo Deal together with a friend, you are guaranteed the best price in the market, oftentimes only $0.99. We also made important technical changes to surface better products in your feed. Try it out today and invite your friends to join in the fun!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This update fixes sneaky bugs that managed to hide from us while we were busy reducing prices to create the best offers for you. So, we squashed them and decided to cut down product prices even more. We now have 1M+ deals as low as $0.99 or 95% off! Enjoy and remember to invite your friends to join in the fun!

Looking for cool home goods, gadgets, fashion, etc. with the best prices among all online stores? Join thousands of users at Blidz Shopper, the social shopper app, with millions of trending products from Apple to Xiaomi.

Blidz Shopper is much more than just another shopping app. Join our shopper games to win free products. With Blidz Shopper you don’t just waste your time while gaming, you get real-money rewards.

🤝 TOGETHER, YOU SAVE - BLIDZ SHOPPER DUO DEAL
At Blidz Shopper, we reward you for sharing your purchases with your friends. Duo Deal allows you to get the most value-for-money with discounts of 90% or more. It’s super simple: when you see a deal in the store, choose to buy it with a friend. Ta-da! You and your friend just saved $$$ on a quality deal together (for example iPhones or TVs).

🎮 USER REWARDS AND SHOPPER GAMES
Every shopper needs a break? Join our shopper games to win free products. With Blidz Shopper you don’t just waste your time while gaming, you get real-money rewards. At sign-up you'll receive your first gift to the store to get you started. Use your points to enter games like treasure hunt, mystery box and Deal FREEze for your chance to win products and cash.

🚀 BLITZ THE COMPETITION & WIN INCREDIBLE DEALS
Blidz Shopper is much more than just another boring shopping app. It’s as if you’re going to the online store or mall together with your friend. Inside awaits a fun playground with the best deals and fun games to make the shopper experience more exciting. Compete in the Treasure Hunt game to win high-value items like smartphones and home goods completely free, participate in fun auctions in our Deal FREEze game and win tons of fat loot to spend inside the online store!

🆓 WHY IS BLIDZ SHOPPER SO AFFORDABLE OR EVEN FREE?
We believe in our users instead of spending money on marketing. By sharing Blidz Shopper, YOU make sure the prices stay low. Invite your friends now to get better deal and discounts!

But there is more: by being active in the Blidz Shopper app, you can earn free Blidz Cash to get deal even cheaper. Especially, active users get points and cash drops that can be exchanged for real-world products. What are you still waiting for?

🌟 DOES BLIDZ SHOPPER REALLY HAVE QUALITY PRODUCTS?
You want it, our online store got it! Browse through our eshop of millions of trending products from high-end electronics and gadgets to home goods and fashion. Every deal is sourced without middle-men from top-tier brands like Apple and Xiaomi. To support you in your eshop experience, we have a 100% secure payment system, customer-friendly return policy and lightning-fast support to help you cash in on the best deal.

Special sign-up offer: Every new Blidz Shopper user gets a gift worth up to $25

BLIDZ SHOPPER CORE FEATURES
• Free starter pack
• Millions of available products
• Best price guarantee amongst all online store
• Social Duo Deal allows you to cash-in on buying with your friends
• Point rewards and fun shopper games
• Personalized product & deal selection
• 100% secure & fully encrypted payments methods: PayPal & all major credit cards
• Fast-delivery and express shipping options
• 30-day guaranteed return policy
• Lightning fast support - contact us at support@blidz.com

BLIDZ SHOPPER PRODUCT CATEGORIES
• Consumer Electronics (smartphones, tablets, cases, chargers etc.)
• Home goods (decor, kitchenware, blender etc.)
• Fashion (men’s, women’s and children’s for every occasion)
• Jewelry (earrings, necklaces, rings etc.)
• Accessories (Hats, gloves, stockings etc.)
• Outdoor & Sports (Camping, fishing, etc.)
• Mother & Kids products (Toys, functional equipment, etc.)
• Beauty products (makeup, skincare, hair styling, etc.)
• Garden and outdoor (Tools, picnic & BBQ, etc.)
• Office supplies (stationery, office shelves etc.)
• DIY (electric parts, industrial tools, automotive parts etc.)
• Pet products (pet toys, clothing, shelters, etc.)
descriptionShort: Buy together for big savings ⎪Best shopper and eshop app⎪Online Outlet Store

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release brings a brand new awesome button to the bottom navigation bar, where it will dynamically display all the free rewards that are available for you. In addition, we also made multiple bug fixes to keep your shopping experience smooth and sweet as usual!
What's more, new products with even lower prices are being added to the app every day, so stay tuned!

Blidz is much more than just another shopping app. Play games, watch videos, earn cash and take advantage of FREE offers. With Blidz you can do everything you already do on other apps but also earn money doing it!

🤝 TOGETHER, YOU SAVE - BLIDZ TEAM BUY
At Blidz, we reward you for sharing your purchases with your friends. Team Buy allows you to get the most value-for-money with discounts of 90% or more. It’s super simple: when you see a deal in the store, choose to buy it with a friend. Ta-da! You and your friend just saved $$$ on a quality deal together (for example iPhones or TVs).

🎮 USER REWARDS AND SHOPPER GAMES
Every shopper needs a break? With Blidz you don’t just waste your time while gaming, you get rewards. Use your points to enter games like treasure hunt, money mamba, candy cash and earn rewards!

🚀 BLITZ THE COMPETITION & WIN INCREDIBLE DEALS
Blidz is much more than just another boring shopping app. It’s as if you’re going to the online store or mall together with your friend. Inside awaits a fun playground with the best deals and fun games to make the experience more exciting.

🆓 WHY IS BLIDZ SO AFFORDABLE OR EVEN FREE?
We believe in our users instead of spending money on marketing. By sharing Blidz, YOU make sure the prices stay low. Invite your friends now to get better deal and discounts!

But there is more: by being active in the Blidz app, you can earn free Blidz Cash to get deal even cheaper. Especially, active users get points and cash drops that can be exchanged for real-world products. What are you still waiting for?

Every deal is sourced without middle-men from top-tier brands like Apple and Xiaomi. To support you in your eshopping experience, we have a 100% secure payment system, customer-friendly return policy and lightning-fast support to help you cash in on the best deal.

Looking for a fun and rewarding way to save on your favorite products? Blidz is a social shopping app that makes it easy to shop smart, earn exciting rewards, and score unbeatable deals on everything from clothes shopping to top-tier electronics. Shop, Save & Earn - Have fun!

Blidz is designed to turn every shopping experience into a game, offering users a chance to earn money through shopping games, group discounts, and special digital coupons.

Whether you’re a cheap deal finder, dollar deal hunter, or looking to save money on your weekly grocery savings, Blidz has something for everyone. Discover the magic of team shopping, share your favorite finds with friends, and unlock a world of rewards and discounts!

Blidz combines the best features of shop and earn, discounts finder, and shop and save apps, providing you with incredible ways to score the best deals on popular products.

🤝 TOGETHER, YOU SAVE - BLIDZ TEAM BUY

Blidz takes team shopping to the next level with group discounts that allow you to shop with friends and score massive savings. Our unique Team Buy feature lets you and your friends enjoy up to 90% off on popular items.

When you spot a great deal, simply select the deal sale/buy option, invite a friend, and together you can grab the ultimate steal deal!

🎮 USER REWARDS AND SHOPPING GAMES

Shopping can be more than just a necessity; it can be fun too! At Blidz, we’ve created a suite of exciting shopping games that let you earn points while you shop.

Whether you’re trying your luck at treasure hunts or playing shopping games like Candy Cash, you’ll always have a way to boost your earnings while enjoying yourself.

These points can be used toward future purchases, making it easier than ever to get the best shopping deals. Every game offers a new opportunity to earn rewards and save on future buys.

🚀 AMAZING DEALS JUST FOR YOU

Blidz doesn’t stop at regular discounts – we’re all about bringing you the hottest deal alerts and brand deals. Our platform is the perfect discounts finder for all types of shoppers.

Our cheap deal finder helps you uncover hidden gems while enjoying a seamless shopping experience. The more you shop, the more you’ll save – and with Blidz, that’s a promise.

🆓 WHY IS BLIDZ SO AFFORDABLE OR EVEN FREE?

Blidz is committed to delivering the best shopping experience without the need for costly ads. Instead of investing heavily in marketing, we believe in the power of our users.

By sharing Blidz with your friends, you not only help us keep prices low but also unlock even more exclusive deals. It’s a win-win: save money, share your experiences, and enjoy the best discounts around. Our focus on social shopping means you’ll always be in on the hottest deals.

🌟 DOES BLIDZ REALLY HAVE QUALITY PRODUCTS?

Whether it’s electronics, gadgets, or fashion, our platform offers a curated selection of the latest trending shopping finds. Plus, every item you buy is backed by a 100% secure payment system, a 30-day return policy, and fast customer support.

Special sign-up offer: Every new Blidz user gets a gift worth up to $25.
